``` {r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)

View(mtcars)

mtcars <- mutate(mtcars, car_models = row.names(mtcars))
mtcars <- mtcars[, c(12, 1, 2 , 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11)]

plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~car_models, y = ~mpg, type = 'scatter',
        mode = 'text', text = ~car_models,
        textfont = list(size = 10)) %>%
      layout(title = 'Various Cars and their MPGs',
             xaxis = list(title = 'Car Models',
                          zeroline = TRUE),
             yaxis = list(title = 'MPGs'))


plot_ly(data, x = ~Bodywt, y = ~Brainwt, type = 'scatter',
        mode = 'text', text = ~Primates, textposition = 'middle right',
        textfont = list(color = '#000000', size = 16)) %>%
# Pass object to the layout function
        layout(title = 'Primates Brain and Body Weight',
             xaxis = list(title = 'Body Weight (kg)',
                          zeroline = TRUE,
                          range = c(0, 250)),
             yaxis = list(title = 'Brain Weight (g)',
                          range = c(0,1400)))



```
